name: Tommy Myers
text: I love mellow mushroom restaurants but had not been to this one.  This one was no different.  The pizza was good.  The service was quick and the server we had was great.  I wish I had gotten her name but didn't. Another great meal

name: rachel english
text: Love the fresh hot off the grill to your plate food. Large selection of adult beverages. They even had mead Wich is delicious if you're into sweet drinks.

text:

The food was delicious but the service was even better , even though he had ‚Ä¶More

text: The toppings are fresh and the cheese is overflowing.   The staff is careful to mind the social distancing guidelines.   The restroom was clean as well. A good pie here will run $25 on average. The only menu is by QR code so I hope your internet/ network is good.

name: michael hood
text:
Just got home with my 2 pizza's and chicken wings.

name: Charlie Williamson
text: The food is always pretty good with colorful workers that brighten up your day. The take home pizza box is really cool aswell. These things combined led to a fantastic experience.

name: Chris Vesper
text: Mellow mushroom has the best quality and variety of pizzas that you can get in Hiram.

name: Ruth Schonfeld
text: Very good service and awesome food!  Good beer selection also.

text: I dont like the QR code menus. But other than that the experience was great. Food was good and service was decent. Had a great time!

name: Jude Patterson
text: Excellent calzones and Greek salad! Great service.

name: tammy battle
text: We got the roasted wings which was delicious and a small veg pizza. Food was hot and service was great..

name: MelindaLeigh65
text: Looks like they are doing their best to keep everything clean. Order came out promptly and correct and tasted great.

name: Michael Greenhill
text: We have people in our family that can't have gluten and they have a good selection of gluten free and vegan pizzas. Their prep for the gluten is very good because no one has had a cross contamination issue.

name: Stan Gold
text: I loved this place so much I went here twice when I was visiting my friend in Georgia. You guys really need to open a location in Toronto! The pizza is stunning and the service is immaculate. Thanks for everything guys.

name: Wayne Parker
text: Fantastic food, very nice staff, consistently  awesome mood. They charge fair prices and the food quality is good. Keep it up.

name: Randall Coleman
text: Good food. Good service. WARM BEER!  Everytime i go there. Warm beer is not good.

name: Ice Nine Melody

text: From the moment we walked in we were greeted by a friendly young man who also was are server. He explained the menu to us. Our food was very good. I did not have a pizza. My granddaughter did and enjoyed it. I had a steak and cheese sandwich that was delicious.  Going back soon.

name: Adam Mosley
text: I am giving two stars because the food was very good, however the service was poor. ‚Ä¶More

text: I enjoyed my service at this location.We sat at the bar to grab a bit .our food was hot .drinks where cold.Clean location.Everyone was polite.Good place to enjoy wings and a cold beer.I will return to this location whenever I'm in the area.

text: love it.  wish there was one closer

name: Thomas Baum
text: Always great service. Bartenders Morris, Jo and Bethany are always wonderful and knowledgeable about the beer they have on selection. Waitstaff are always friendly and accommodating. Lots of great beer specials and the trivia nights are always fun. Easily of the best chill spots in Hiram.

name: Matthew Erdlen
text: Only one word needed, excellent! The service we received was amazing. The food came out fast with the restaurant being pretty full. Definitely the place to stop for a slice of za!

text: This spot knows how to serve their customers. Always with a very welcoming mindset. The food is fairly priced, always yummy and neat.

name: Jackie Luna
text: We ordered half meat and half great white,  wow!!! Definitely good pizza . Service was good. Place was quiet the time we arrived (early Saturday afternoon). Decent parking , and well lit. Thanks !
